Class Debug.LogFormatter

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Formatter
com.j2igf.event.Debug.LogFormatter
Enclosing class:
Debug
public static class Debug.LogFormatter extends Formatter
This is the inner class that defined the log formatter.
